beer.name: Bully! Porter
beer.description: The intense flavors of dark-roasted malt in Boulevard's rendition of the classic English porter are perfectly balanced by a generous and complex hop character. Bully! Porter's robust nature makes it the ideal companion to a variety of foods, from seafood to chocolate.\nSENSORY DESCRIPTION: Full body and distinct hoppiness is best paired with, hearty, full-flavored foods. Flavor hooks: chocolate, roasted flavors
beer.grains: Pale, Caramunich, Special B & Chocolate malts.
